tool_description: An API showing the latest news and articles about Web3 from all around the world
name: web3-news-api
title: web3-news-api

api_list.name: Get individual articles from a source
api_list.description:
Get articles about Web3 from a particular source. Currently it serves articles only on hashnode and dev.to 

Valid sourceId = hashnode , dev.to
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/articles/hashnode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Web3 articles
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back articles about Web3.

api_list.name: Get individual news source news
api_list.description:
Get individual Web3 news from a particular news source. Currently it serves news that are only on economictimes , ndtv , cointelegraph , bitcoinnews , entrepreneur .

Valid newssourceId = economictimes , ndtv , cointelegraph , bitcoinnews , entrepreneur .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/economictimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newssourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Web3 news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all latest news about Web3 from all over the world.
api_list.code:

url = "https://web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web3-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
